cause.description:
We at the AR-SINA beleive that interstellar ninjas are also people, and no matter what upper cutting and throatslitting, squat thrusting and ass kicking that they do they are always loved by god. Let the blood baths begin. also beef stew and plenty of it
1. Protection of ninjas
2. Serving ninjas
3. Extending the brotherhood of ninjas
cause.name: ALL RELIGIONS supporting interstellar ninja attacks
